title: How to Prepare an MRE (Meals Ready to Eat)

steps.title: Open up the MRE bag.
steps.content: Open up the MRE bag. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Look for a plastic bag that is labeled with "heater".
steps.content: Look for a plastic bag that is labeled with "heater".

steps.title: Fill the heater up with water until it goes to the fill line.
steps.content: Fill the heater up with water until it goes to the fill line. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Let the heater sit for a minute so it can heat up.
steps.content: Let the heater sit for a minute so it can heat up.

steps.title: Insert the entrée, still in its package, into the heater.
steps.content: Insert the entrée, still in its package, into the heater.

steps.title: Prop the heater up with the entrée so it can heat properly.
steps.content: Prop the heater up with the entrée so it can heat properly. [3] X Research source

steps.title: The MRE will be heated and ready to eat in a few minutes.
steps.content: The MRE will be heated and ready to eat in a few minutes. [4] X Research source
